title: FACT CHECK: Yes, Joanna Gaines From 'Fixer Upper' Is Pregnant
subtitle: Joanna and Chip Gaines, stars of the home improvement reality TV show, made the announcement on social media.
author: www.snopes.com
vclaim:
'Fixer Upper' star Joanna Gaines is pregnant with her fifth child in January 2018.

In January 2018, news broke that Joanna Gaines, star of HGTV’s home improvement reality TV show Fixer Upper, was pregnant with her fifth child.

Fixer Upper, currently in its final season, has introduced millions of viewers to Gaines and her husband Chip, a Texas couple who scout potential homes for participants, then design and carry out renovations on the show.

Their somewhat unlikely stardom has come with relentless tabloid speculation about the state of their marriage as well as scrutiny of the Gaines’s business history, parenting, and extended circle of acquaintances.

Chip Gaines announced the pregnancy to the world on his Instagram account on 3 January, posting a photo of the couple and writing:

Joanna Gaines confirmed the news the following day, posting a photograph of an ultrasound to her 6.3 million Instagram followers.
